title: Loop of Problem Patching League of legends
body: Hello, just a few minutes ago I received a notification saying that my League client had issues patching to the new version of League and needed to be restored to the older version and attempted to be patched to the newest version. Now my client is in a loop of "being restored to an older version" message to "unable to patch" message, making me unable to access my client. Is there anything I can do in regards to this to fix it?

replies.body:
Hey guys, be super wary about setting your clock back.  I know a lot of players have suggested it as a workaround, but your OS clock is important to a lot of features in and out of League.  Doing so can cause you more problems, including getting into a game.  Loss prevention is not active and you may be prone to Leaverbuster.  Please take care in doing this, at your own risk!

> **UPDATE @ 10:53am PT** In some cases, [reconfiguring your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) may resolve the issue for some players.  

In the meantime, stay tuned on our pinned thread or [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for updates.

It seems I am able to log in for some time (like five minutes) before a message appears asking/forcing me to restart the client, so in a way I'm still stuck in a loop. This is odd because the Service Status page for NA says there are no problems.
Thanks for the info here.  What happens if you [reconfigure your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)?

I am not very knowledgeable in this kind of thing so pardon my ignorance. I would rather just wait at this point for a couple of reasons. Firstly, because I share my internet with my family, I would rather not change anything. Secondly because you said yourself this is not a guaranteed fix and that you guys are working on a fix at this very moment.  Forgive me for not being much of use. I will say, though, you guys were very quick to respond to the problem as a whole, and you have my thanks for that.

step 1. set clock back to friday
step 2. login
step 3. set clock back to normal

no problem.  once you are logged in, you can set your clock back to normal and the issue is resolved.
i followed the steps on the whole dns thing and it did nothing, so for me it wasnt a fix just letting you know :)
I'm getting it too. It's an issue on Rito's end most likely.
Same. I just got out of a game and then it started doing this too.
Just got it as well, DO NOT uninstall, does not fix it and now I feelsbadman
I uninstalled to dont do it the PVP.Patcher kernal breaks
Same for me and my friend, logged in to up-vote in hopes the rito gods will address this.
yep have the same issue just finished a ranked and when going to play another got the loop syndrome
Same my guy...
Just got it right now.
just fixed it too by going into File Location --> lol.launcher.admin --> run as administrator , it launched and is now patching properly !
It doesn't work, it only opens up a different patching window that doesn't actually patch
It just gets stuck at 33%
How do i do That??
https://gyazo.com/5e25015380d9edf2787d9a940caf960d Simply scroll down, right click and run as admin
It's stuck at '1 file scanned' for me. 33%.
FYI Uninstalling/Reinstalling does NOT solve the issue. Just tried.
Go to your League directory and launch the lol.launcher.admin as admin should work, atleast it did for me.
This didn't work for me. It leaves me with "1 files scanned" and doesn't progress past that. Trying to Repair it scans all of the files and then just returns to the "1 files scanned" dilemma.

Hey guys, we're investigating this 'infinite loop' issue.  We've updated the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page and created a pinned thread for updates. 

Our technicians are investigating and working on a fix.

 I know this has been a hassle, thanks for bearing with us!

Guys set your date/time back to friday or the 11th.
It seems like this is the best fix there is atm.
Thanks to GildedHorizon and Once I Turn 18 for the tip.

If you're on a mac try this, it worked for me: system preferences, network, click on your wifi and then advanced in the bottom right, DNS, add (+) DNS server 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.8.4, click ok, click apply, try launching the client.
^^^ this worked 100% thank you so. much props bro
Setting my clock back worked? Wtf rito ??

> [{quoted}](name=Once I Turn 18,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GAVEY8Oa,comment-id=0050,timestamp=2017-08-12T17:13:17.367+0000)
>
> Setting my clock back worked? Wtf rito ??

Wow it does I set day to the 11th and it lets me play now....

Yeah. Same here. East Coast...etc..etc. Got out of a game, looked at the post game results, and then went back to home page, and it said there was an issue. Now it's just looping on the login page. "We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version" then (immediately after hitting "okay") "There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating against after you restart the patcher". Btw, yes I restarted the entire pc(3x), I've checked my internet connection(how else could I post here? lol), and unless someone has a better idea, i'm deleting the whole damned thing and redownloading it. If that doesn't work..well, Riot..the ball is in your court.
Hello there just got the patch loop issue
Same thing for me.

This does not work for everyone. Many have been reporting that it does not work. I tried it does not work for me either. Everyone should still try it. It might work for you. Not guaranteed though.  :/

running it with the  lol.launcher.admin.exe got me back in, but after sitting there for like 1 min the problem happened again, this happened a few months ago and i had to reinstall  stupid riot, can't learn from previous mistakes lol
C: > RiotGames > League of Legends > lol.launcher.admin Opens and exits without updating , re open the first laucher , enjoy :)
Did absolutely nothing except give me the same errorts lol...
It worked for me for about 3 seconds and then the issue repeated itself.
any chance its only for people on the east coast? or maybe something like that because i have friends on the west coast they are just fine
EUW server suffered this too
same issue for me and my clan. none of us have been able to complete an update today
its so annoying, whyd it happen while urf is out q.q

This is the same for me. It says there was a problem patching the league of legends. Try updating again after you restart the patcher. And i tryed to change the time but it didn't work so plz fix.{{summoner:4}}

hey, just had this problem, what you want to do is change your date to august 11th, Friday, then open your league, once the loop starts the restart button will pop up, do not ,I repeat do not press on restart button yourself, let the game count it down and it will restart the patch, then you just wait for about 8 minutes and there you go it's fixed.

i fixed it my own way.. what i did that worked for me to resolve the loop error issue was first off
you need to go into leagueoflegends.com and log in to change your password, once u have successfully changed it
you then open up league like if you were logging in to play, before you fill in your acc info click on the settings
and hit FULL REPAIR
it will take over 10 mins to fuly repair corrupted files but when its finished i logged in with my new password and ALL WENT WELL
(currently playing a game as im writing this)
HOPE THIS HELPS FOR OTHERS WHO HAVE TRIED EVERYTHING
Are you guys also using malwarebytes? I was and it was blocking the patcher and causing the infinite loop.  Try whitelisting it and it might help.
Hey can any one help me my league of legends is in the loop also please help me I don't want to take the risk of turning my clock back

i fixed it my own way.. what i did that worked for me to resolve the loop error issue was first off
you need to go into leagueoflegends.com and log in to change your password, once u have successfully changed it
you then open up league like if you were logging in to play, before you fill in your acc info click on the settings
and hit FULL REPAIR
it will take over 10 mins to fuly repair corrupted files but when its finished i logged in with my new password and ALL WENT WELL
(currently playing a game as im writing this)
HOPE THIS HELPS FOR OTHERS WHO HAVE TRIED EVERYTHING
